titles.title: A bill to resolve title issues involving real property and equipment acquired using funds provided under the Alaska Kiln Drying Grant Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 3/3/2015--Introduced. Vests title to real property and equipment acquired using funds provided under the Alaska Kiln Drying Grant Program in the grant recipient in accordance with the compensation provisions in this Act.
